name: Deadly Blobs
description:
Rules

Rules of this game are simple: Avoid the BLOBs! 

Objective

You win game after you regain your full body. After some time you can choose to upgrade your body to a next level, gaining its another part.

Controls:
  • Skip the cutscene - ENTER
  • Move the player - WASD
  • Upgrade the player - LEFT MOUSE
  • Restart the game - R
Further information

Arcade game made for Ludum Dare 45 with theme Start with nothing.

This game was inspirated by the original Legend of Zelda game.

The game was programmed in Godot, painted in Krita with music produced in Soundation. 

Thank you for playing

This was the first time I participated in a Game Jam and I really enjoyed it.
